item.description:
This topic will cover some unique solutions to the multi-site challenge.

- Addressing site requisition
- Addressing multi-site security
- Configuring the media library
- Allowing for variances in presentation
- Allowing for variances in data schemes and information architecture
- Making performance and page edit support a standard feature
- Growing a "platform" of common features

Come hang with ISITE Design and see how they've solved these problems for a number of local clients running some very aggressive multi-site installations.

6:00pm Food
6:30pm Start

There's a lot to cover, expect this meetup to run to 8:00pm.

*NOTE: NEW ROOM AT THE CIC!!! We have a limited number of spaces. Please only RSVP if you can make it*
item.how_to_find_us: Sign up in the lobby and travel to the 11th floor. You will be met.
item.name: A Small Multisite Installation - Taking Sitecore to the Next Level
